title: vandisi nODuva
sahitya:
vandisi mODuva banni namma tandeyu rAyara pAdaka malavanu


anupallavi

  cendadi tungA tIrada mElina sundara brndAvanavanu sEri


caraNam 1    hindina pApagaLellavu karuNadindali kaLevaru ivarallavE
onde kSaNadali indeya shOkava khaNDisi AluvarillavE
    caraNam 2    bandavarellaabhISTava koLvaru pondi sukhadalli nindu bALvaru
sandarusanavittu salahuvarivare endigU namage rAyare gatiye
